abstract: Software giant Microsoft dismissed speculation it might still be interested in a takeover of Internet firm Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: Software giant Microsoft dismissed speculation it might still be interested in a takeover of Internet firm Yahoo.

headline.main: Microsoft Chief Pours Cold Water on Yahoo Speculation

abstract: Is Steve Ballmer simply negotiating? Or is he really so emotionally wounded from past encounters with Yahoo that he can no longer evaluate a potential acquisition with strategic objectivity?
lead_paragraph: Is Steve Ballmer simply negotiating? Or is he really so emotionally wounded from past encounters with Yahoo that he can no longer evaluate a potential acquisition with strategic objectivity?

headline.main: Deal Spin: Microsoft and the Art of Moving On

abstract: Big companies like Microsoft and Yahoo are making industrial-strength applications based on Web 2.0 principles, especially information sharing.
snippet: Big companies like Microsoft and Yahoo are making industrial-strength applications based on Web 2.0 principles, especially information sharing.
lead_paragraph: As the economy totters, it’s easy to make fun of the concept of “Web 2.0” — the rallying cry of a generation of chipper start-ups spawned over the last few years with an unusual aversion to vowels.
